card.text: (Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)
When Spirit Artist Class enters the battlefield, you may return target Aura card from your graveyard to your hand.
Each creature you control gets +1/+1 for each Aura attached to it.
Auras you control have Umbra Armor. (If enchanted permanent would be destroyed, instead remove all damage marked on it and destroy an Aura with Umbra Armor attached to it.)
